content: I don’t know why I’m trying to begin a response to this. I’m speechless, totally blown away. Yup, I’ll read this again and again, and hope to retain some semblance of your piece and put to it to use in my life. You’ve said so much, too much for me to absorb all at once. Being a Christian seems relevant now after processing just the initial reading. Wow, Jonas, you’ve cracked through the wall of conventional Christian language and meaning that I’ve taken for granted and dismissed for most of my life, and now I’m beginning to see the light through that crack. Thanks a bunch.
